FAIL_TO_PASS: when both short and long flags then sort on short flag
when set sortOptions then options are sorted within groups
when showGlobalOptions:true and sortOptions: true then global options sorted
when lone short and long flags then sort on lone flag
when negated option then sort negated option separately
when mixed case flags then sort is case insensitive
when sortOptions:true then options sorted alphabetically
when set sortOptions then groups are in order added not sorted
